mapper.insert:
SELECT contents_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO contents(contentsno, adminno, nbno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(#{contentsno}, #{adminno}, #{nbno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT contentsno, adminno, nbno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, point, salecnt FROM contents WHERE contentsno = #{contentsno}

SELECT contentsno, adminno, nbno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, point FROM contents WHERE nbno = #{nbno} ORDER BY contentsno DESC

SELECT contentsno, adminno, nbno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, point FROM contents
WHERE nbno=#{nbno}
WHERE nbno=#{nbno} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%')
ORDER BY contentsno DESC
